NESTLÉ Scary Assorted Halloween Full-Sized Bars Carton 8 pack

Make no compromises when it comes to treat time, party time or trick-or-treating with NESTLÉ® Full-Sized Halloween Assorted Bars (364 g). A collection of your favourite NESTLÉ® treats like SMARTIES®, AERO®, KITKAT® and COFFEE CRISP® – in Halloween-themed packaging! Plus, these bars are made with natural flavours, sustainably sourced cocoa, and no artificial colours in a peanut-free facility. It’s the best way to Treat Some Good with NESTLÉ®, and share your love of the sweet things with family and friends.

NESTLÉ Scary Assorted Halloween Full-Sized Bars Carton 8 packFeatures and Benefits
A collection of your favourite NESTLÉ® full-sized bars: SMARTIES®, KITKAT®, COFFEE CRISP® and AERO®
Made with natural flavours, and no artificial colours in a peanut-free facility
Halloween-themed packaging makes them perfect for handing out to trick-or-treaters or sharing at parties with friends and family
We purchase Sustainably Sourced Cocoa certified by UTZ, as part of the NESTLÉ® COCOA PLAN®. We work with UTZ and farmers to improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities
Proudly Supporting Kids Help Phone: For more than 34 years, NESTLÉ Canada has raised millions for Kids Help Phone, Canada's only 24/7, free, confidential, and multilingual e-mental health service
Proudly Prepared in Canada

NESTLÉ Scary Assorted Halloween Full-Sized Bars Carton 8 packIngredients

Scaries (Smarties)Milk chocolate (sugar, milk ingredients, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, whey powder, lactose, soya lecithin, polyglycerol polyricinoleate, natural flavour), sugar, wheat flour, modified corn starch, carnauba wax, colour.Small candies may pose a choking hazard.Coffin Crisp (Coffee Crisp)Sugar, modified palm, sunflower and/or safflower oil, wheat flour, modified milk ingredients, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, soya lecithin, coffee, sodium bicarbonate, lactose, cocoa, yeast, polyglycerol polyricinoleate, natural flavours.Scaero (Aero)Milk chocolate (sugar, milk ingredients, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, whey powder, lactose, soya lecithin, polyglycerol polyricinoleate, natural flavour).Kit Kat (Halloween)Milk chocolate (sugar, milk ingredients, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, whey powder, lactose, soya lecithin, polyglycerol polyricinoleate, natural flavour), wheat flour, sugar, modified palm oil, cocoa, sodium bicarbonate, soya lecithin, yeast, natural flavour.
